10
11#include "pc/video_track_source.h"
12
13#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
14
15namespace webrtc {
16
17VideoTrackSource::VideoTrackSource(bool remote)
18 : state_(kInitializing), remote_(remote) {
19 worker_thread_checker_.Detach();
20}
21
22void VideoTrackSource::SetState(SourceState new_state) {
23 if (state_ != new_state) {
24 state_ = new_state;
25 FireOnChanged();
26 }
27}
28
29void VideoTrackSource::AddOrUpdateSink(
30 rtc::VideoSinkInterface<VideoFrame>* sink,
31 const rtc::VideoSinkWants& wants) {
32 RTC_DCHECK(worker_thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
33 source()->AddOrUpdateSink(sink, wants);
34}
35
36void VideoTrackSource::RemoveSink(rtc::VideoSinkInterface<VideoFrame>* sink) {
37 RTC_DCHECK(worker_thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
38 source()->RemoveSink(sink);
39}
40
41} // namespace webrtc
42
